text: 12.19 Lo 32.35, Snd 24.29, Mat 5.39, Lom 12.17, 13.4, 1 Te 1.6-7, Hib 10.30 Binɨb mapen yad okok, binɨb nɨbop gɨ tɨmel gɨpal ak, kɨlop pen gɨ tɨmel gɨnɨgun agɨl gos ak ma nɨgɨnɨmɨb. Ak God gos ne. Kɨlop pen gɨ tɨmel gin agɨl, ke nɨgup tek gɨnɨgab. Nɨb nepɨm, Bɨawl ak ne takaw agak anɨb ak, buk Baybol ak tɨkɨl agak,
